mapper.sql: id, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, user_id AS userId, balance, used_margin AS usedMargin,dynamic_balance AS dynamicBalance, total_enter AS totalEnter, total_exit AS totalExit, product_type AS productType, version
mapper.update: UPDATE c_personal_account SET balance = balance - #{num}, used_margin = used_margin + #{num}, version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
mapper.select: SELECT c.keyword AS currency,a.balance,a.used_margin AS usedMargin FROM c_personal_account a LEFT JOIN t_account_config c ON c.account_type = a.product_type where a.user_id = #{userId}
